value.excerpt: #37 Easily create infographics in Power BI with infographics desginer  Do you want to create infographics in Power BI? In this video I will show you how to do just that! value.title: Running totals in power query??? Yes, you can :)

value.title: Replace BLANK with Zero in Power BI Visuals Such as Card
